name: create-demo-assets
author: Dan Zeitman <dan@audioshake.ai>
description: Generate and refresh AWS S3 presigned URLs for AudioShake demo assets. A lightweight Node.js command-line tool that lists S3 media assets, generates presigned URLs, and outputs a `demo-assets.json` file for easy integration into your audio, video, or SDK demos.   Designed for developers who regularly work with secure Amazon S3 buckets to manage and refresh demo content.
